Texts.Chs: 大多数^orange;武器，护甲和工具^reset;都可以使用^orange;个人三度仪^reset;进行^green;升级^reset;。只需单击看起来类似于^orange;物质枪模块^reset;的按钮即可！这样做将花费^orange;升级模块^reset;或^orange;物质枪模块^reset;。
Texts.Eng: Most ^orange;Weapons, Armor and Tools^reset; can be ^green;Upgraded^reset; with your ^orange;Personal Tricorder^reset;. Just click the button that looks like a ^green;Manipulator Module^reset;! It'll cost either ^orange;Upgrade Modules^reset; or ^orange;Manipulator Modules^reset; to do it.
